markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Extra Squishy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1423) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Unbreakable Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=20) heritage

</column>

---

Your rubbery physique makes it easier for you to wedge yourself into tight spaces and more difficult for your enemies to dislodge you. You become trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1). If you would automatically become trained in Acrobatics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. If you roll a success to [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), you get a critical success instead. While you're Squeezing, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DCs against attempts to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) you or otherwise move you from your space.
name: Extra Squishy
